divs: Sighting Detailsi was going across town (jeff hill) to pick up someone.when i crossed the intersection across highway 36 something was glowing in the clear night sky.i didnt think it was nothing until it slowed down like it was making a landing, but before it got close to the ground it dissapeared.it was going at a high rate of speed, but it didnt have a trail of light as if it was a meteorite or a shooting star.it just glowed in the night sky as if it was some kind of air vehicle making a landing.i wanted to go investigate, but couldnt figure out where it landed if landed at all.this is about the time i grabbed my camera phone to take a picture, but i was so mesmorized it was too late.
Summary: it was a white glowing oval shaped object
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around October 31st 2007
